subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Armstrong, the seven-time Tour de France champion, revealed on Twitter that he will have a fifth child, then finished fifth in the third stage of the Tour of the Gila in New Mexico to help his teammate Levi Leipheimer maintain his overall lead.
snippet: Armstrong, the seven-time Tour de France champion, revealed on Twitter that he will have a fifth child, then finished fifth in the third stage of the Tour of the Gila in New Mexico to help his teammate Levi Leipheimer maintain his overall lead.
